item.description:
I'm training for the Hartford Half with Team in Training but I also receive a bit of email from new runners getting started and looking for group motivation. Thought maybe the track would be a nice spot for both new and seasoned runners to meet.

Planning to do a mile or so warm up which would be a great opportunity to mingle with newer runners. After that I will most likely do a little speed work consisting of 6 x 400's (one lap at a faster pace) followed by a walking or slow jog recover lap.
item.how_to_find_us: Should be easy to spot people hanging around inside the track area.
item.name: North Haven Track
